description: This Kotlin source file defines the HomeScreen composable and related UI components for an Android TV streaming app. It constructs a home interface featuring a large banner, multiple horizontally scrolling media carousels, fade-in animations, and focus management for TV navigation, displaying media sections like 'Recommended', 'Top Picks', and 'Recently Added'.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: Composable function rendering the main home screen with featured banner and media sections.

methods.name: FeaturedBanner
methods.description: Displays a large banner with background image, overlay text, and 'Play Now' call-to-action button.

methods.name: SectionRow
methods.description: Displays a titled row with a horizontally scrolling list of media poster cards, with fade-in animation and focus handling.
